verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Father we praise you,
We love you,we adore you,
Glorify Thy name in all the earth,
Glorify Thy name,
Glorify Thy name,
Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus we praise you,
We love you, we adore you,
Glorify Thy name in all the earth,
Glorify Thy name,
Glorify Thy name,
Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit we praise you,
We love you, we adore you,
Lead us to the Lord and all His ways,
Lead us to the Lord,
Lead us to the Lord.
Lead us to the Lord and all His ways.
